name: guard---gerenciador-de-contatos
description: Um sistema completo de gerenciamento de contatos com autenticação de usuários, upload de imagens e interface moderna desenvolvida com React e NestJS.

scripts.dev:backend: cd BackEnd && npm install && npm run start:dev
scripts.dev:frontend: cd FrontEnd && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --prefix BackEnd run start:dev" "npm --prefix FrontEnd run dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start:backend:alt: cross-env PORT=3001 npm --prefix BackEnd run start
scripts.start: concurrently "npm --prefix BackEnd run start" "npm --prefix FrontEnd run start"
scripts.start:alt: concurrently "cross-env PORT=3001 npm --prefix BackEnd run start" "npm --prefix FrontEnd run start"
